solution_line_template: Since a day has {hours_per_day} hours, the project was to take {hours_per_day}*{project_days} = <<{hours_per_day}*{project_days}={total_project_hours}>>{total_project_hours} hours.
Bill took {num_naps} seven-hour naps during the four days, a total of {num_naps}*{nap_duration_hours} = <<{num_naps}*{nap_duration_hours}={total_nap_hours}>>{total_nap_hours} hours
The time he spent working on the project is {total_project_hours}-{total_nap_hours} = <<{total_project_hours}-{total_nap_hours}={working_hours}>>{working_hours} hours.
